author: Stephy Chung, CNN
title: Dissident artist Ai Weiwei says virus has only strengthened China's 'police state'
description: The artist has been critical of China's handling of the outbreak and believes the "arrogance and success" of the government's authoritarian tactics will lead it into another crisis.
content:
artsPublished 22nd April 2020
As the world grapples with unprecedented lockdown measures, Ai Weiwei finds himself in familiar territory. The outspoken artist spent nearly three months in a tiny room while detained by authorities in China in 2011. 
He was la… [+6894 chars]
